name: ThreePlants Infotech
tag_list: ecommerce, erp, crm, ebay-store-design, amazon-store-integration, facebook-store-design, seo
overview:
The ECommerce/ERP Software Solution. ThreePlants e-Commerce Solution helps our clients to enhance their online business by offering trouble free e-Commerce software. It has been designed for next generation eSales by offering list of tools and integrations like eBay,amazon, Play.com etc and multiple app store like mobile application and facebook store to enhance web sales.It has been designed to enable companies to manage multi-channel interactions with consistency and agility.It is integrated with ThreePlants CRM solution to help organization to interact and provide better customer service to their customers to cultivate more loyal and profitable customers.

Some people feels that it is difficult to make online online sales, because of they want very smooth and effort less software that can fullfil their need.

ThreePlants provide an well integrated E-Commerce Software ,it require few steps to make product visible for sale on website, it provides multi-Channel integration by which sales can happen on multiple websites like eBay,amazon and Play.com etc, but intventory will be centralized, in simple way using ThreePlants E-Commerce Solution you can make business(sales) on multiple channel and websites using single platform.It provides very effective order tracking and completiion mechanism by single click.
